overview: Scarlett Sage suspects that Ivy Wolfe might be harboring some feelings for her stepmom. When she asks her if she's into her, Ivy can't keep the secret any longer. Scarlett has an idea...Since the girls dress alike and wear the same makeup, she's gonna help Ivy seduce her mom. Abigail Mac reaches out to touch Tegan James' huge breasts, thinking Tegan's step-daughter, Kate England isn't homeâ€¦but she's in total shock as she watches silently from the doorway, jealous that her mom got to bang her hot teacher first.  Feeling played, Natalia Starr runs up to her room in a huff. Alexa Grace and Carmen Caliente decide to follow her upstairs to fuck her. Natalia slowly warms up to the idea. Natalia helps take off her panties. She goes from mad to horny pretty quickly.
title: Want to Join Us?
